text: Gregory Oliver Hines (February 14, 1946 â€“ August 9, 2003) was an American singer, dancer and actor. He was born in New York City. He has acted in many movies and television programs. He also acted in Broadway plays. He died of liver cancer in Los Angeles at the age of 57.
